attributes.action: offer sanctuary and residency within the UK to those released from US Custody in the Guantanamo Bay Detention Centre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to offer sanctuary and rights of residency to all 'detainees' released from US Custody in Guantanamo Bay who: a) have been released without charge or b) have been declared innocent by a civilian court.  The vast majority of those held in Guantanamo are thought to be innocent.  We ask the Prime Minister to do what no other country in the World seems prepared to: to show compassion to innocent men, and to allow them to re-build their lives.
